channel.title: Roger Peer Support Companion Updates
channel.description: Latest updates and improvements to Roger, the AI peer support companion for mental health serving Cleveland, Lorain, and Northeast Ohio

item.title: Roger Peer Support Platform Launch for Ohio Communities
item.description: Introducing Roger, a secure AI peer support companion for mental health with professional supervision and crisis intervention protocols, now serving Cleveland, Lorain, Brook Park, Mentor, Hudson, Parma, Cuyahoga Falls, Madison, Jefferson, Ashtabula, Conneaut, Wickliffe, Richmond Heights, Willoughby, Chardon, and Burton, Ohio.

item.title: Ohio Mental Health Resources Now Available
item.description: Comprehensive mental health resources and crisis intervention support now available for Northeast Ohio communities including Cleveland, Lorain, and surrounding areas.
